TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit IPEndPoint extends System.Net.EndPoint

summary.span: 將網路端點表示成 IP 位址和通訊埠編號。

span.span: Represents a network endpoint as an IP address and a port number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別包含主應用程式和所需的應用程式連接至服務主機上的本機或遠端的連接埠資訊。The class contains the host and local or remote port information needed by an application to connect to a service on a host. 藉由結合主機的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼的一項服務，類別形式的連線點服務。By combining the host's IP address and port number of a service, the class forms a connection point to a service. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Net.IPEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPEndPoint/CPP/ipendpoint.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.IPEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPEndPoint/CS/ipendpoint.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.IPEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.IPEndPoint/VB/ipendpoint.vb#1)]

summary.span: 傳回 執行個體的雜湊值。

An integer hash value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的 IP 端點執行個體的雜湊碼。The method returns a hash code of the IP endpoint instance. 此值可用來當做雜湊表中的索引鍵。This value can be used as a key in hash tables.
